name: Orient Computer Encrypted Data File
summary: Learn about .PDEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PDEX files are saved in an encrypted format that is only supported by the Orient Computer program that created the file. PDEX files may be used for various purposes depending on the program that creates it. Mail Protect creates PDEX files to protect the contents of email and Security Folder creates PDEX files to protect users' files from ransomware attacks.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
